comments:
Hi!

Eclipse: 3.0 RC2 
Build id: 200406111814
Synchronization: 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSException: Synchronization bytes are
missing for parent of resource 'a_resource' in synchronization partner
'org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.syncinfo.CVSBaseResourceVariantTree' on get.
        
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.syncinfo.CVSResourceVariantTree.getResource
Variant(CVSResourceVariantTree.java:133)
        at
org.eclipse.team.core.variants.ResourceVariantTreeSubscriber.getSyncInfo(Resour
ceVariantTreeSubscriber.java:53)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSSyncTreeSubscriber.getSyncInfo(CVSSyncTr
eeSubscriber.java:77)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.subscribers.SubscriberEventHandler.collect(Subsc
riberEventHandler.java:247)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.subscribers.SubscriberEventHandler.processEvent(
SubscriberEventHandler.java:401)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler.processEvents(BackgroundE
ventHandler.java:283)
        at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler$1.run(BackgroundEventHand
ler.java:140)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)

I've found a related bug Bug#42792 but it says there that is fixed.

I thought it was but appearently it is not. Could you tell us what you were 
doing when the exception was logged? Is this reproducable for you? I suspect 
that the problem is that one thread is accessing the sync info while another 
is clearing it which would mean that there would be no adverse side effects. 
Was there any noticable side effects?

You are very right about side-effects: there were not side effects.
The exception occured during a normal synchronization. I will try tomorrow to
reproduct it and give you a more suitable bug scenario.

Sorry (or happy - i am not quite sure) I cannot reproduce it.

Digging into my memory the exception occured during the following operations:
- the project was already checked out
- the project was a little modified in Eclipse 3.0 RC1
- the project was created in Eclipse 3.0 RC2
- the project was synchronized

traces.message: Synchronization bytes are missing for parent of resource 'a_resource' in synchronization partner 'org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.syncinfo.CVSBaseResourceVariantTree' on get.
